statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); git_branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf "%s in %s on %s@%s" "$model" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$git_branch" "$(hostname -s)"; else printf "%s in %s@%s" "$model" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$(hostname -s)"; fi
